TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CallbackDebugBehavior extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.Description.IEndpointBehavior

summary.span: 啟用 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 回呼物件的服務偵錯。

span.span: Enables service debugging for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) callback object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過應用程式組態檔或以程式設計方式，將 屬性設定為 `true`，讓用戶端回呼物件中的 Managed 例外狀況資訊流動回到服務，以供偵錯之用。Set the property to `true` from an application configuration file or programmatically to enable the flow of managed exception information in a client callback object back to the service for debugging purposes. > [!CAUTION] > 將 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回服務可能導致安全性風險，因為例外狀況詳細資料會公開未授權的服務可使用的內部用戶端實作相關資訊。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services. 此外，雖然也能以程式設計方式設定 屬性，不過在部署時很容易會忘記停用 。In addition, although the properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable when deploying. 由於牽涉到安全性議題，我們強烈建議您：Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - 使用應用程式的組態檔將 屬性的值設定為 `true`。You use an application configuration file to set the value of the property to `true`. - 您只能在受控制的偵錯狀況下這樣做。You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 安全性問題與 managed 例外狀況資訊，請參閱[指定與處理合約和服務中的錯誤](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。 the security issues related to managed exception information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). 您也可以設定此屬性的值使用[ <callbackDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<callbackDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例所示範的用戶端組態檔，會指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 從 SOAP 訊息中的用戶端回呼物件中傳回 Managed 例外狀況資訊。The following code example shows a client configuration file that instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to return managed exception information from a client callback object in SOAP messages. [!code-xml[SCA.CallbackContract#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/sca.callbackcontract/cs/client.exe.config#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool includeExceptionDetailInFaults) cil managed

param.name: includeExceptionDetailInFaults
param.span: 控制 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 回呼物件是否包括 SOAP 錯誤傳回給服務之詳細資料中的 Managed 例外狀況資訊。

span.span: Controls whether a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] callback object includes managed exception information in the detail of the SOAP faults sent back to the service.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式會建立 物件，其中 屬性的值為 `includeExceptionDetailInFaults` 的值。The constructor creates a object in which the value of the property is the value of `includeExceptionDetailInFaults`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值控制用戶端回呼物件是否將 SOAP 錯誤中的 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回給服務。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that controls whether client callback objects return managed exception information in SOAP faults back to the service.

value.span: 如果 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 會傳回 SOAP 錯誤中的 Managed 用戶端回呼例外狀況資訊，以供雙工通訊中服務偵錯之用，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] returns managed client callback exception information in the SOAP faults for service debugging purposes in duplex communication; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 透過應用程式組態檔或以程式設計方式，將 屬性設定為 `true`，讓用戶端回呼物件中的 Managed 例外狀況資訊流動回到服務，以供偵錯之用。Set the property to `true` from an application configuration file or programmatically to enable the flow of managed exception information in a client callback object back to the service for debugging purposes. > [!CAUTION] > 將 Managed 例外狀況資訊傳回服務可能導致安全性風險，因為例外狀況詳細資料會公開未授權的服務可使用的內部用戶端實作相關資訊。Returning managed exception information to services can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal client implementation that could be used by unauthorized services. 此外，雖然也能以程式設計方式設定 屬性，不過在部署時很容易會忘記停用 。In addition, although the properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable when deploying. 由於牽涉到安全性議題，我們強烈建議您：Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - 使用應用程式的組態檔將 屬性的值設定為 `true`。You use an application configuration file to set the value of the property to `true`. - 您只能在受控制的偵錯狀況下這樣做。You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios. [!INCLUDE[crabout](~/includes/crabout-md.md)] 安全性問題與 managed 例外狀況資訊，請參閱[指定與處理合約和服務中的錯誤](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md)。 the security issues related to managed exception information, see [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/docs/framework/wcf/specifying-and-handling-faults-in-contracts-and-services.md). ### 若要使用組態檔啟用或停用 CallbackDebugBehavior 的功能To enable or disable a feature of CallbackDebugBehavior using a configuration file 1. 新增`behaviorConfiguration`屬性設定為用戶端[\<端點 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017)元素您[!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)]用戶端應用程式。Add a `behaviorConfiguration` attribute to the client [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) element for your [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] client application. 行為是端點行為。The behavior is an endpoint behavior. 上所設定的端點行為``項目，而服務行為上設定[<服務>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md)項目。Endpoint behaviors are configured on `` elements; service behaviors are configured on [<service>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/service.md) elements. 2. 若要加入或建立[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)區段，加入[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)元素的名稱符合`behaviorConfiguration`步驟 1 中屬性值。Add to or create an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) section and add a [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element to that with the name that matches the `behaviorConfiguration` attribute value from step 1. 端點行為會加入用戶端中使用[\<端點 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017)項目使用[ <endpointBehaviors> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md)項目。Endpoint behaviors are added for use in a client [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/13aa23b7-2f08-4add-8dbf-a99f8127c017) element using an [<endpointBehaviors>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/endpointbehaviors.md) element. 3. 新增[ <callbackDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md)元素[<行為>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md)步驟 2 中的項目，啟用或停用適當的各種屬性您的案例。Add a [<callbackDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md) element to the [<behavior>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/behavior-of-endpointbehaviors.md) element from step 2 and enable or disable the various properties appropriate to your scenario. 如需特定範例，請參閱＜範例＞一節。For a specific example, see the Example section. 您也可以設定此屬性的值使用[ <callbackDebug> ](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md)用戶端應用程式組態檔中的項目。You can also set the values of this attribute by using the [<callbackDebug>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/wcf/callbackdebug.md) element in a client application configuration file. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例所示範的用戶端組態檔，會指示 [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] 從 SOAP 訊息中的用戶端回呼物件中傳回 Managed 例外狀況資訊。The following code example shows a client configuration file that instructs [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/includes/indigo2-md.md)] to return managed exception information from a client callback object in SOAP messages.
